title: Textile, ca. 1830
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 148.5 x 86 cm (58 7/16 x 33 7/8 in.)
description: Bacchanalian scenes showing Dionysius (Bacchus) and Ariadne riding  in a chariot drawn by panthers and goats in the center surrounded various scenes associated with the legend of Dionysius. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1830.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-370.
